summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6744 for the improvement of 7TH AVENUE SOUTHWEST from Southwest Roxbury Street to Southwest Cambridge Street, and a certain other avenue, by asphaltic paving, levying and assessing the amounts thereof upon the property within the district, establishing a local improvement fund, and amending Ordinance 112542, Section 3, to correct an error in the description of the boundaries of said district.
